https://tmrev.io/movie/211328-A New Day in Old Sana'a 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Tariq's aristocratic family has arranged for him to marry Bilquis, the daughter of a rich judge. However, while out in the city one night, he catches sight of a woman he believes to be Bilquis, and falls in love with her. The woman turns out to be an orphan from the lower class - a henna artist named Ines. A New Day in Old Sana'a
